card.name: Hawkeye
card.property: "Quick Draw" â€” Action: Exhaust Hawkeye â†’ ready Hawkeye's bow.
"I may not be the mightiest Avenger, but I'm definitely the coolest."

alternate.name: Clint Barton
alternate.property: Weapon of Choice â€” Action: Spend 1 resource of any type â†’ search your deck and discard pile for Hawkeye's Bow and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck. (Limit once per phase).

card.name: Hawkeye's Bow
card.property: Restricted. Your hero gets +1 ATK and each of your [[arrow]] attacks gain ranged.

card.name: Hawkeye's Quiver
card.property: You may play [[arrow]] events attached to this card as if they were in your hand. Hero Action: Exhaust Hawkeye's Quiver â†’ search the top 5 cards of your deck for an [[arrow]] event and attach it faceup to this card.

card.name: Mockingbird
card.property: Interrupt: When the villain initiates an attack against you, spend 1 resource of any type and return Mockingbird to your hand â†’ prevent all damage from this attack.
"Is that all you got?"

card.name: Sonic Arrow
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Exhaust Hawkeye's Bow â†’ confuse an enemy and deal 3 damage to it (5 damage instead if it is already confused)
EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!!!

card.name: Explosive Arrow
card.property: Hero Action: Exhaust Hawkeye's Bow and choose a player â†’ deal 3 damage to the villain and each minion engaged with that player.
"Anyone ever tell you how your eyes sparkle when you're angry?" -- Clint Barton

card.name: Electric Arrow
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Exhaust Hawkeye's Bow â†’ stun an enemy and deal 3 damage to it (5 damage instead if it is already stunned).
"Hail Hawkeye!" -- Clint Barton

card.name: Cable Arrow
card.property: Hero Action (thwart): Exhaust Hawkeye's Bow â†’ remove 3 threat from a scheme, ignoring any crisis icons in play.
"It's a great way to get around." -- Clint Barton

card.name: Vibranium Arrow
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Exhaust Hawkeye's Bow â†’ deal 6 damage to an enemy. This attack gains piercing.

card.name: Expert Marksman
card.property: Resource: Exhaust Expert Marksman â†’ generate a [wild] resource for an [[arrow]] event.
"When you fight alongside gods and monsters, it's not enough to be great; you have to the best." -- Clint Barton

card.name: Hawkeye
card.property: Action: Exhaust this ally and discard 1 card from your hand â†’ deal X damage to an enemy, where X is the number of printed resources on that card.
"You see I', literally pointing arrows at your, right?."

card.name: Black Knight
card.property: Black Knight's basic attack gains piercing.
"As long as the Black Blade blazes darkly in my hand, I must fight on."

card.name: Goliath
card.property: Action: Goliath gets +4 ATK until the end of the phase. At the end of the phase, discard Goliath. (Max once per phase.)
"Sometimes being a gentleman means holding the door, and the rest of the building."

card.name: U.S. Agent
card.property: Retaliate 1.
"Cap isn't the only solider who loves his country."

card.name: Sky Cycle
card.property: Attach to an [[Avenger]] ally. Max 1 per ally. Attached ally gains [[Aerial]]. Action: Exhaust Sky Cycle â†’ ready attached ally.

card.name: Team Training
card.property: Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player. Each ally you control gets +1 hit point.
"We mostly just wait for Cap to yell 'Avengers Aseemble' and attack in the same direction as him" -- Clint Barton

card.name: Ready for Action
card.property: Hero Action: Give an ally you control a tough status card.
"Try that again. I dare you." -- Jessica Drew

card.name: War Machine
card.property: Toughness. War Machine's basic attack gains ranged.

card.name: Earth's Mightiest Heroes
card.property: Hero Action: Exhaust an [[avenger]] character you control â†’ ready another [[avenger]] character you control.
"We come together to fight what can't be fought alone." -- Luke Cage

card.name: Spider-Woman
card.property: "Superhuman Agility" â€” Interrupt: When you play an aspect card, Spider-Woman gets +1 THW, +1 ATK, and +1 DEF until the end of the round. (limit once per round for each aspect.)

alternate.name: Jessica Drew
alternate.property: Double Agent â€” Choose two aspects instead of one during deck-building. You must include an equal number of cards from those aspects in your deck. Action:: Look at the top card of any deck. (Limit once per round.)

card.name: Captain Marvel
card.property: Response: After Captain Marvel uses a basic power, draw 1 card.
"I gotta hand it to you, kid. This is one of the more impressive messes I've ever seen."

card.name: Finesse
card.property: Hero Resource: Exhaust Finesse â†’ generate a [wild] resource for an aspect card.

card.name: Jessica Drew's Apartment
card.property: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Jessica Drew's Apartment â†’ search the top 5 cards of your deck for an aspect card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

card.name: Venom Blast
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Deal 5 damage to an enemy.

card.name: Pheromones
card.property: Hero Action: Stun and confuse an enemy.
"Warn me before you use that power again, okay?" -- Peter Parker

card.name: Contaminant Immunity
card.property: Hero Action: Heal 3 damage from Spider-Woman and give her a tough status card.

card.name: Inconspicuous
card.property: Hero Action (thwart): Remove a total of 3 threat from among schemes in play.
"Now all I gotta do is Spy-der Woman my way inside." -- Jessica Drew

card.name: Self-Propelled Glide
card.property: Hero Action: Ready Spider-Woman. She gains [[aerial]] until the end of the round.
"People always think I can fly. I can't But I do glide really well." -- Jessica Drew

card.name: Spider-Girl
card.property: Response: After you play Spider-Girl from your hand, stun and confuse a minion.
"Alright you bunch of losers. Who wants a piece of me?."

card.name: Press the Advantage
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Deal 2 damage to an enemy. If that enemy is stunned or confused, draw 1 card.
"You are in Wakanda now!" -- T'Challa

card.name: Piercing Strike
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Deal 3 damage to an enemy. This attack gains piercing.

card.name: Spider-Man
card.property: Response: After you play Spider-Man from your hand, remove 3 [per_hero] threat from a side scheme.
"Seriously, what is it with New York? Would it kill you to invade Denver once?."

card.name: Skilled Investigator
card.property: Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player. Hero Response: After a side scheme is defeated, exhaust Skilled Investigator â†’ draw 1 card.

card.name: Clear the Area
card.property: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 2 threat from a scheme. If this removes the last threat on that scheme, draw 1 card.
"Don't be scared, honey. Just think about how jealous the other kids will be when you tell them how Iron Man resuced you." -- Tony Stark

Attach to Crossfire. Otherwise, attach to the villain.

card.property: "I consider myself a craftsman. I specialize in destruction and terror."

card.property: Absorbing Man gains the trait of each environment in play.

card.name: Infinite Power
card.property:
When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Give Red Skull a tough status card. Red Skull schemes.
When Revealed (Hero): Give Red Skull a tough status card. Red Skull attacks you.

card.name: The Red House
card.property:
Red Skull cannot take damage.
Interrupt: When a character thwarts this side scheme, they may use their ATK instead of their THW.
Red Skull built his fortress over the White House as a symbol of Hydra's conquest over America.

card.name: The Sleeper Awakened
card.property:
This scheme cannot leave play while The Sleeper is in play.
When Revealed: Put The Sleeper into play engaged with the first player. When The Sleeper is defeated, remove this card from the game.
Rising from the Potomac River, The Sleeper has awakened to answer Red Skull's summons.

card.name: Prison Camps
card.property: When Defeated: The player who defeated this scheme searches their deck and discard pile for an ally, puts it into play, and shuffles their deck.
Under Hydra's rule, families are separated and incarcerated without due process.

card.name: Censor the Past
card.property: When Defeated: Each player chooses up to 3 cards in their discard pile and shuffles them into their deck.
Hydra controls all media outlets and uses propaganda to turn the masses against the heroes of the past.

card.name: Hydra Reinforcements
card.property: When Defeated: The player who defeated this scheme discards a non-Elite minion.
What Hydra lacks in skill, they make up for with sheer numbers.

card.name: Mass Chaos
card.property: When Revealed: Each player discards the top 5 cards of their deck and places 1 threat here for each different type of resource icon ([energy],[mental],[physical], or [wild]) they discarded this way.
Red Skull creates catastrophes across the country to keep his enemies busy.

card.name: Hydra Jet-Trooper
card.property: Quickstrike.

card.name: Hail Hydra!
card.property: When Revealed: Each Hydra minion engaged with a hero makes an attack against that hero. Each player who was not attacked this way searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a Hydra minion, puts it into play engaged with them, and shuffles the encounter deck.

card.name: Combat Knife
card.property:
Attach to the villain.
Hero Action: Spend [mental][physical resources â†’ discard this card.

card.name: Hydra Sidearm
card.property:
Attach to the Villain.
Hero Action: Spend [mental][physical] resources â†’ discard this card.

card.name: Weapon Master
card.property:
When Reveled (Alter-Ego): The villain schemes. If they have a Weapon attachment, this card gains surge.
When Reveled (Hero): the villain attacks you. If they have a Weapon attachment, this card gains surge.

card.name: Concussion Grenade
card.property:
When Revealed (Alter-Ego): You are confused. Place 1 threat on the main scheme (2 threat instead if you were already confused).
When Revealed (Hero): You are stunned. Deal 1 damage to your hero (2 instead if you were already stunned).

card.name: Hydra Regular
card.property: Incite 1. (When this card is revealed, place 1 threat on the main scheme.)
"When you consider the kind of person would join a terrorist organization bent on world domination, it's easy to see why Hydra's troops don't impress." -- Jessica Drew

card.name: Hydra Soldier
card.property:
Guard.(While this minion is engaged with you, you cannot attack the villain.)
Deal the engaged player an encounter card.

card.name: Hydra Patrol
card.property: When Defeated: Each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a Hydra minion and puts it into play engaged with them. Shuffle the encounter deck.
Hydra Soldiers perform routine patrols to maintain control of their territory.

card.name: Adrenal Stims
card.property:
Setup.
Hero Action: Discard this card and remove it from the campaign log â†’ ready your hero and heal 5 damage from them.

card.name: Tactical Scanner
card.property:
Setup.
Hero Action: Discard this card and remove it from the campaign log â†’ draw 5 cards.

card.name: Emergency Teleporter
card.property:
Setup.
Hero Action: Discard this card and remove it from the campaign log â†’ search your deck and discard pile for an ally, put it into play, and give it a tough status card.

card.name: Laser Cannon
card.property:
Setup.
Hero Action: Discard this card and remove it from the campaign log â†’ deal 5 damage to the villain and each enemy engaged with you.

card.name: Basic Thwart Upgrade
card.property:
Permanent. Setup.
You get +2 hit points.
Your hero gets +1 THW.

card.name: Improved Thwart Upgrade
card.property:
Permanent. Setup.
You get +2 hit points.
Your hero gets +1 THW.
Response: After you defeat a side scheme, exhaust this card â†’ draw 1 card.

card.name: Basic Attack Upgrade
card.property:
Permanent. Setup.
You get +1 hit points.
Your hero gets +1 ATK.

card.name: Improved Attack Upgrade
card.property:
Permanent. Setup.
You get +1 hit points.
Your hero gets +1 ATK.
Hero Response: After you defeat a minion, exhaust this card â†’ draw 1 card.

card.name: Basic Defense Upgrade
card.property:
Permanent. Setup.
You get +3 hit points.
Your hero gets +1 DEF.

card.name: Improved Defense Upgrade
card.property:
Permanent. Setup.
You get +3 hit points.
Your hero gets +1 DEF.
Hero Response: After you defend against an attack, exhaust this card â†’ draw 1 card.

card.name: Basic Recovery Upgrade
card.property:
Permanent. Setup.
You get +4 hit points.
Your alter-ego gets +1 REC.

card.name: Improved Recovery Upgrade
card.property:
Permanent. Setup.
You get +4 hit points.
Your alter-ego gets +1 REC.
Response: After you use your REC, exhaust this card â†’ draw 1 card.

card.name: Zola's Algorithm
card.property: Alter-Ego Action Exhaust your alter-ego and spend a [mental] resource â†’ discard this card.
"A beautiful parasite growing inside the world's most secure computer systems." -- Arnim Zola

card.name: Medical Emergency
card.property:
Forced Response: At the end of your turn, take 1 damage if you are in hero form.
Alter-Ego Action: Discard the top 5 cards of your deck and spend a [physical] resource â†’ discard this card.
"This is going to need sutures." -- Stephen Strange

card.name: Martial Law
card.property:
Your hand size is reduced by 1.
Alter-Ego Action: Deal yourself an encounter card and spend a [energy] resource â†’ discard this card.

card.name: Anti-Hero Propaganda
card.property:
Your hero gets -1 THW, -1 ATK, and -1 DEF.
Alter-Ego Action: Take 2 damage and spend a [wild] resource â†’ discard this card.
"These dissenters breed conflict. They are your true enemies." -- Hydra News Media
